review: As far as the performance the Fire tv stick, it exceeded my expectation. It was compatible with the USB ports on my on my flat-screen tv. Set up was a breeze. The remote makes far better than other services for Internet TV and movies. However my problem with amazon movies.  all the free movies that  are available through amazon prime are old and there is a cost for renting current movies even with an amazon prime membership. .other than this the firestick is great!
author: bthomas2040

review: Thus far, it is performing beautifully.  Also, the remote is great.
author: wv3

review: Our kids love it. Its a great deal too!!
author: Michele Winning

review: Love the fire stick! Allows me to watch shows that I can not with Apple TV.
author: shelley

review: Expected more, terribly long shipping, laggy. When multicasting fire phone, huge delay. Impossible to stream anything smooth
author: brian

review: Great device and inexpensive ... very happy I bought it!
author: LMC6882

review: Easy to connect and tons of viewing options! Very pleased.
author: JoAnn

review: This item works fine and is easy to install.  The only drawback is that an Amazon Prime membership is necessary to get the content without paying for each item.  It is great for a Neyflix account.  The shipping was S L O W.
author: Reginald Stanmar
